          <title>
            <string language="en">Kekule structure for benzene</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kekule Struktur für Benzol</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Structure de Kekule pour le benzène</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estrutura de Kekule para o benzene</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Struttura di Kekule per benzene</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δομή Kekule για το βενζόλιο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estructura de Kekule para el benceno</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the Kekule structure for benzene where the single and double bonds may be placed in two alternative positions.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">benzene</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">carbon atoms</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Kekule Struktur für 
Benzol, in dem die einzelnen und Doppelbindungen in zwei alternative 
Positionen gelegt werden können.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre la structure de Kekule 
pour le benzène où les obligations simples et doubles peuvent être
placées dans deux positions alternatives.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a estrutura de Kekule 
para o benzene onde as únicas e ligações dobro podem ser colocadas 
em duas posições alternativas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra la struttura di 
Kekule per benzene in cui i singoli e legami doppi possono essere 
disposti in due posizioni alternative.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει δομή Kekule για το 
βενζόλιο όπου οι ενιαίοι και διπλοί δεσμοί μπορούν να 
τοποθετηθούν σε δύο εναλλακτικές θέσεις.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la estructura de Kekule
para el benceno donde los enlaces solos y dobles se pueden poner en 
dos posiciones alternativas.</string>
          </description>
